00046 u16 crc_ccitt_fast(u16 crc, u8 *buffer, u32 length);

00056 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057   u32 seed = 0x0000;
00058   u32 SW_sum, HW_sum;
00059   u8 crc_dat[9] = {'1','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9'};
00060 
00061 /* CRC table for the CRC-CCITT(ITU-T V.41). The poly is 0x1021 (x^16 + x^12 + x^5 + 1)                      */
00062 const u16 crc_ccitt_tab[256] =
00063 {
00064   0x0000, 0x1021, 0x2042, 0x3063, 0x4084, 0x50a5, 0x60c6, 0x70e7,
00065   0x8108, 0x9129, 0xa14a, 0xb16b, 0xc18c, 0xd1ad, 0xe1ce, 0xf1ef,
00066   0x1231, 0x0210, 0x3273, 0x2252, 0x52b5, 0x4294, 0x72f7, 0x62d6,
00067   0x9339, 0x8318, 0xb37b, 0xa35a, 0xd3bd, 0xc39c, 0xf3ff, 0xe3de,
00068   0x2462, 0x3443, 0x0420, 0x1401, 0x64e6, 0x74c7, 0x44a4, 0x5485,
00069   0xa56a, 0xb54b, 0x8528, 0x9509, 0xe5ee, 0xf5cf, 0xc5ac, 0xd58d,
00070   0x3653, 0x2672, 0x1611, 0x0630, 0x76d7, 0x66f6, 0x5695, 0x46b4,
00071   0xb75b, 0xa77a, 0x9719, 0x8738, 0xf7df, 0xe7fe, 0xd79d, 0xc7bc,
00072   0x48c4, 0x58e5, 0x6886, 0x78a7, 0x0840, 0x1861, 0x2802, 0x3823,
00073   0xc9cc, 0xd9ed, 0xe98e, 0xf9af, 0x8948, 0x9969, 0xa90a, 0xb92b,
00074   0x5af5, 0x4ad4, 0x7ab7, 0x6a96, 0x1a71, 0x0a50, 0x3a33, 0x2a12,
00075   0xdbfd, 0xcbdc, 0xfbbf, 0xeb9e, 0x9b79, 0x8b58, 0xbb3b, 0xab1a,
00076   0x6ca6, 0x7c87, 0x4ce4, 0x5cc5, 0x2c22, 0x3c03, 0x0c60, 0x1c41,
00077   0xedae, 0xfd8f, 0xcdec, 0xddcd, 0xad2a, 0xbd0b, 0x8d68, 0x9d49,
00078   0x7e97, 0x6eb6, 0x5ed5, 0x4ef4, 0x3e13, 0x2e32, 0x1e51, 0x0e70,
00079   0xff9f, 0xefbe, 0xdfdd, 0xcffc, 0xbf1b, 0xaf3a, 0x9f59, 0x8f78,
00080   0x9188, 0x81a9, 0xb1ca, 0xa1eb, 0xd10c, 0xc12d, 0xf14e, 0xe16f,
00081   0x1080, 0x00a1, 0x30c2, 0x20e3, 0x5004, 0x4025, 0x7046, 0x6067,
00082   0x83b9, 0x9398, 0xa3fb, 0xb3da, 0xc33d, 0xd31c, 0xe37f, 0xf35e,
00083   0x02b1, 0x1290, 0x22f3, 0x32d2, 0x4235, 0x5214, 0x6277, 0x7256,
00084   0xb5ea, 0xa5cb, 0x95a8, 0x8589, 0xf56e, 0xe54f, 0xd52c, 0xc50d,
00085   0x34e2, 0x24c3, 0x14a0, 0x0481, 0x7466, 0x6447, 0x5424, 0x4405,
00086   0xa7db, 0xb7fa, 0x8799, 0x97b8, 0xe75f, 0xf77e, 0xc71d, 0xd73c,
00087   0x26d3, 0x36f2, 0x0691, 0x16b0, 0x6657, 0x7676, 0x4615, 0x5634,
00088   0xd94c, 0xc96d, 0xf90e, 0xe92f, 0x99c8, 0x89e9, 0xb98a, 0xa9ab,
00089   0x5844, 0x4865, 0x7806, 0x6827, 0x18c0, 0x08e1, 0x3882, 0x28a3,
00090   0xcb7d, 0xdb5c, 0xeb3f, 0xfb1e, 0x8bf9, 0x9bd8, 0xabbb, 0xbb9a,
00091   0x4a75, 0x5a54, 0x6a37, 0x7a16, 0x0af1, 0x1ad0, 0x2ab3, 0x3a92,
00092   0xfd2e, 0xed0f, 0xdd6c, 0xcd4d, 0xbdaa, 0xad8b, 0x9de8, 0x8dc9,
00093   0x7c26, 0x6c07, 0x5c64, 0x4c45, 0x3ca2, 0x2c83, 0x1ce0, 0x0cc1,
00094   0xef1f, 0xff3e, 0xcf5d, 0xdf7c, 0xaf9b, 0xbfba, 0x8fd9, 0x9ff8,
00095   0x6e17, 0x7e36, 0x4e55, 0x5e74, 0x2e93, 0x3eb2, 0x0ed1, 0x1ef0

00098 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100   * @brief  Main program.
00101   * @retval None
00102   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00103 int main(void)
00104 {
00105   CKCU_Configuration();
00106 
00107   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00108 
00109   printf("\r\n[CRC-CCITT]");
00110   /* CRC-CCITT
00111    * width:   16-bit
00112    * poly:    0x1021
00113    * seed:    0xFFFF
00114    * XOROut:  0x0000
00115    * RefIn:   No
00116    * RefOut:  No
00117    */
00118 
00119   /* SW CRC                                                                                                 */
00120   test_fun1();
00121 
00122   /* HW1 CRC                                                                                                */
00123   test_fun2();
00124 
00125   /* HW2 CRC, move data by CPU                                                                              */
00126   test_fun3();
00127 
00128   #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00129   /* HW3 CRC, move data by PDMA                                                                             */
00130   test_fun4();
00131   #endif
00132 
00133   while (1);
00134 }
00135 
00136 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00137   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00138   * @retval None
00139   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00140 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00141 {
00142   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00143   /* Enable CRC and PDMA Peripheral clock                                                                   */
00144   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA       = 1;
00145   CKCUClock.Bit.CRC        = 1;
00146   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00147 }
00148 
00149 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00150   * @brief  SW CRC, move data by software.
00151   * @retval None
00152   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00153 void test_fun1(void)
00154 {
00155   printf("\r\n>  SW: ");
00156 
00157   SW_sum = crc_ccitt_fast((u16)seed, crc_dat, sizeof(crc_dat));
00158   printf("sum = 0x%04X", SW_sum);
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00162   * @brief  HW1 CRC, move data by CPU.
00163   * @retval None
00164   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00165 void test_fun2(void)
00166 {
00167   printf("\r\n> HW1: ");
00168 
00169   HW_sum = CRC_CCITT(seed, crc_dat, sizeof(crc_dat));
00170   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00171 }
00172 
00173 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00174   * @brief  HW2 CRC, move data by CPU.
00175   * @retval None
00176   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00177 void test_fun3(void)
00178 {
00179   printf("\r\n> HW2: ");
00180 
00181   CRC_Configuration();
00182 
00183   CRC_Process(HT_CRC, crc_dat, 5);
00184 
00185   HW_sum = CRC_Process(HT_CRC, crc_dat + 5, 4);
00186   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00187 }
00188 
00189 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00190 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00191   * @brief  HW3 CRC, move data by PDMA.
00192   * @retval None
00193   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00194 void test_fun4(void)
00195 {
00196   printf("\r\n> HW3: ");
00197 
00198   CRC_Configuration();
00199 
00200   PDMA_Configuration();
00201 
00202   PDMA_SwTrigCmd(PDMA_CH0, ENABLE);
00203 
00204   while (PDMA_GetFlagStatus(PDMA_CH0, PDMA_FLAG_TC) == RESET);
00205   PDMA_ClearFlag(PDMA_CH0, PDMA_FLAG_TC);
00206 
00207   HW_sum = CRC_Process(HT_CRC, NULL, 0);
00208   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00209 }
00210 #endif
00211 
00212 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00213   * @brief  crc_ccitt_fast.
00214   * @retval None
00215   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00216 u16 crc_ccitt_fast(u16 crc, u8* buffer, u32 length)
00217 {
00218   while (length--)
00219     crc = crc_ccitt_tab[(crc >> 8 ^ *buffer++) & 0xFF] ^ (crc << 8);
00220 
00221   return crc;
00222 }
00223 
00224 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00225   * @brief  Configure the CRC.
00226   * @retval None
00227   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00228 void CRC_Configuration(void)
00229 {
00230   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00231      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00232      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00233   */
00234   CRC_InitTypeDef CRC_InitStructure;
00235   CRC_InitStructure.Mode = CRC_CCITT_POLY;
00236   CRC_InitStructure.uSeed = seed;
00237   CRC_InitStructure.uCR = 0;
00238   CRC_Init(HT_CRC, &CRC_InitStructure);
00239 }
00240 
00241 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00242 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00243   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00244   * @retval None
00245   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00246 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00247 {
00248   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00249      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00250      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00251   */
00252   PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00253   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr   = (u32)crc_dat;
00254   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr   = (u32)&HT_CRC->DR;
00255   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt    = sizeof(crc_dat)/3;
00256   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen    = 3;
00257   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize  = WIDTH_8BIT;
00258   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority  = L_PRIO;
00259   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod    = (SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX);
00260   PDMA_Config(PDMA_CH0, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00261   PDMA_IntConfig(PDMA_CH0, (PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC), ENABLE);
00262   PDMA_EnaCmd(PDMA_CH0, ENABLE);
00263 }
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00267 /*********************************************************************************************************//**

00271   * @retval None
00272   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00273 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00274 {
00275   /*
00276      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00277      Debug message can be added here.
00278      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00279   */
00280 
00281   while (1)
00282   {
00283   }
00284 }
00285 #endif
